com.yahoo.search.federation.vespa

Class VespaSearcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yahoo.component.AbstractComponent
      • com.yahoo.component.chain.ChainedComponent
        • com.yahoo.processing.Processor
          • com.yahoo.search.Searcher
            • com.yahoo.search.cluster.PingableSearcher
              • com.yahoo.search.cluster.ClusterSearcher<Connection>
                • com.yahoo.search.federation.http.HTTPSearcher
                  • com.yahoo.search.federation.http.HTTPProviderSearcher
                    • com.yahoo.search.federation.http.ConfiguredHTTPProviderSearcher
                      • com.yahoo.search.federation.vespa.VespaSearcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, NodeManager<Connection>, Comparable<Component>

    public class VespaSearcher
extends ConfiguredHTTPProviderSearcher
    Backend searcher for external Vespa clusters (queried over http).

    If the "sources" argument should be honored on an external cluster when using YQL+, override chooseYqlSources(Set).

    Author:
    Arne Bergene Fossaa, Steinar Knutsen

    • Method Detail

      • getQueryMap

        public Map<String,String> getQueryMap(Query query)
        Description copied from class: HTTPProviderSearcher
        Returns the key-value pairs that should be added as properties to the request url sent to the service. Must be overridden in subclasses to add the key-values expected by the service in question, unless HTTPSearcher.getURI(com.yahoo.search.Query, com.yahoo.search.federation.http.Connection) (from which this is called) is overridden.

        This default implementation returns the query.properties() prefixed by "source.[sourceName]" or "property.[propertyName]" (by calling HTTPProviderSearcher.addNonExcludedSourceProperties(com.yahoo.search.Query, java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.lang.String>)).

        Overrides:
        getQueryMap in class HTTPProviderSearcher

      • getCacheKey

        public Map<String,String> getCacheKey(Query q)
        Specified by:
        getCacheKey in class HTTPProviderSearcher

      • marshalQuery

        public String marshalQuery(Query query)
        Serialize the query parameter for outgoing queries. For YQL+ queries, sources and fields will be set to all sources and all fields, to follow the behavior of other query types.
        Parameters:
        query - the current, outgoing query
        Returns:
        a string to include in an HTTP request

      • marshalQuery

        public String marshalQuery(QueryTree root)

      • unmarshal

        public void unmarshal(InputStream stream,
                      long contentLength,
                      Result result)
        Description copied from class: HTTPProviderSearcher
        Unmarshal the stream by converting it to hits and adding the hits to the given result. A convenience hook called by the default unmarshal(entity,result). Override this in subclasses which does not override unmarshal(entity,result).

        This default implementation throws an exception.

        Overrides:
        unmarshal in class HTTPProviderSearcher
        Parameters:
        stream - the stream of data returned
        contentLength - the length of the content in bytes if known, or a negative number if unknown
        result - the result to which unmarshalled data should be added

      • getSegmenterVersion

        protected com.yahoo.collections.Tuple2<String,Version> getSegmenterVersion()
        Get the segmenter version data used when creating YQL queries. Useful if overriding marshalQuery(Query).
        Returns:
        a tuple with the name of the segmenting engine in use, and its version

      • chooseYqlSources

        protected void chooseYqlSources(Set<String> sources)
        Choose which source arguments to use for the external cluster when generating a YQL+ query string. This is called from marshalQuery(Query). The default implementation clears the set, i.e. requests all sources. Other implementations may modify the source set as they see fit, or simply do nothing.
        Parameters:
        sources - the set of source names to use for the outgoing query

      • chooseYqlSummaryFields

        protected void chooseYqlSummaryFields(Set<String> summaryFields)
        Choose which summary fields to request from the external cluster when generating a YQL+ query string. This is called from marshalQuery(Query). The default implementation clears the set, i.e. requests all fields. Other implementations may modify the summary field set as they see fit, or simply do nothing.
        Parameters:
        summaryFields - the set of source names to use for the outgoing query
